## LLM AND attack
| **Title** | **Date** | **Comment** |
| --- | --- | --- |
| **[Incivility and Rigidity: The Risks of Fine-Tuning LLMs for Political Argumentation](http://arxiv.org/abs/2411.16813v3)** | 2025-06-20 |  |
| **[Can LLMs Hack Enterprise Networks? Autonomous Assumed Breach Penetration-Testing Active Directory Networks](http://arxiv.org/abs/2502.04227v2)** | 2025-06-20 |  |

ACM, New York, NY, USA, 15 pages. https://doi.org/10.1145/3719027.3744856</p></details> |
| **[DrunkAgent: Stealthy Memory Corruption in LLM-Powered Recommender Agents](http://arxiv.org/abs/2503.23804v2)** | 2025-06-19 |  |

Submitted to the 16th Asia-Pacific Symposium on Internetware (Internetware 2025)</p></details> |

| **[RAS-Eval: A Comprehensive Benchmark for Security Evaluation of LLM Agents in Real-World Environments](http://arxiv.org/abs/2506.15253v1)** | 2025-06-18 | 12 pages, 8 figures |
